title: CFB expert breaks down NFL Draft (Football 04/30)
description:
Chip Patterson joins Will Brinson LIVE! from the CBS Sports Raleigh offices to break down the 2018 NFL Draft from a college football perspective. Chip and Will discuss whether the Arizona Cardinals got enough playmakers to make an impact in 2018, if the Indianapolis Colts got tougher at the line of scrimmage and how the RPO coaching factor might come into play for Andrew Luck and the guys they drafted on the offensive line, which college running backs are set to make an immediate impact (Chip compares one to Alvin Kamara, whether Derwin James might make the Chargers a viable Super Bowl contender and much more.
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy
